name: CharTurnerBeta - Lora (EXPERIMENTAL)
description:
This thing is EXPERIMENTAL.

It 100% will try to take over your style and character.

Please use caution. Also, weight it down to .2-.4

Mixes well with charTurnerV2

and is being released EARLY and BEFORE IT'S READY because a few prompts in charTurnerV2 mention it.

I know it has problems. I KNOW IT DOES. It's a beta. :D

Use at your own risk. :3

- mouse

modelVersions.name: CharTurnBetaLora
modelVersions.description:
beta, use at your own risk.

Small grids: lora strength 0-1 over three seeds in different models.

Large grids: Lora strength 0-1 vertical, CharTurnerv2 strength 0-1 horizontal, in different models.

(uploading error, will upload soon) Clip Skip: I use both 1 and 2. There's a protogen grid showing both clip 1 and clip 2

meta.prompt: A photographic style character turnaround of a an 1800's flamboyant pirate captain with a big feather in his hat and a peg leg. Parrot, eyepatch, mustache, grin, highly detailed face. Multiple views of the same character in the same outfit, <lora:mw_charturn3:.3>  (15Charturn_longCap_D: .5), art by smoose2, ANALOG STYLE, MODELSHOOT STYLE, NSFW, NUDITY
